snippet.title: Labyrinth (Brøderbund) for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

???


Game description:

Labyrinth is a maze game, similar to Pac-Man. 

You have to free 4 men that are contained inside of 4 boxes. Once that is done, a blinking "X" will appear, marking the exit.

On the way to the prisoners you can collect bonus points. 

The walls of the maze will open and close at random, but you can shoot closed walls to open them. You can also shoot enemies, which will give you a bonus shot if you hit them.


What I think:

Not a bad game, but it becomes tedious after a while. Overall it is okay...
